about_the_game:
Before You Buy

Unhorrible Horror Game is currently developed solely by Bilibili creator "OldWood_u." The chapters are incomplete, and you may encounter various bugs during gameplay. Please decide carefully before purchasing. (Or add it to your wishlist and wait for the full version!)

Game Background

A forgetful reporter and a cowardly narrator. In this quirky duo, you play as the reporter, Lin, exploring an empty office building alongside a talkative narrator who seemingly came out of nowhere. As you investigate, you'll uncover cases you previously exposed. Using newspapers as a medium, you'll even travel back to the crime scenes and explore long-buried secrets through the perspective of your "former self."

Features

  • Unique First-Person Exploration: Afraid of the dark? You’ve got a flashlight! Afraid of ghosts? You’ve got a gun! You might feel scared playing solo, but what if there’s someone in the game more scared than you?

  • Interaction with the Narrator: A high-and-mighty narrator? A robotic voice? Nope! Here, the narrator is just like you. He’s emotional, talkative, and might even argue with you. He could even scream louder than you at a dark corner!

  • Bizarre and Surreal Memories: Each chapter is a complete story. Through scattered notes, your brilliant mind, and the narrator's occasional inspirations, you’ll piece together the events. Ultimately, you'll uncover the mysteries of your and the narrator’s pasts and identities…

  • Fully Voiced Gameplay: The narrator is voiced by Bilibili creator "OldWood_u." (Alright, it’s mainly because I couldn’t afford a professional voice actor.)

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit

short_description: Want to try a horror game but too scared to play? Then why not give Unhorrible Horror Game a shot! In there, you'll have a super fun (cowardly) narrator accompanying you! Together, you'll experience bizarre memories, exploring the mysteries of reporter "Lin" and the narrator’s pasts and identities…
